trans-unit.source: Used to specify the type of event, and its arguments (if any) to be generated as part of the rendering of text to speech by a custom synthetic speech engine.
trans-unit.target: Usato per specificare il tipo di evento e i relativi argomenti, se presenti, che un motore di sintesi vocale personalizzato deve generare come parte del rendering del testo.

trans-unit.source: A custom speech synthesis engine requests the generation of events under the Speech Platform by providing an appropriate <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance to <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> engine site object passed to implementations of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Motore di sintesi vocale personalizzato richiede la generazione di eventi in una piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale, fornendo un'apposita <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> membro del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> oggetto sito motore passato alle implementazioni di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente fa parte di un'implementazione di sintesi vocale personalizzato che eredita da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e tramite l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze e crea una nuova matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze deve essere passato il `Speak` metodo su un motore di sintesi sottostante.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore di enumerazione da trovato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, l'implementazione

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms nel testo da leggere.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfacce fornite per il supporto di implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> il tipo di evento, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza viene utilizzata per creare un evento per l'unità viene creato un indicatore di avanzamento sintetizzatore.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Viene quindi chiamato il motore di rendering vocale con modificato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matrice.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId" /> indicating the sort of Speech platform event the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object is to handle.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId" /> che indica l'ordine dell'evento della piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale che l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> deve gestire.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType" /> indicating how the <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> reference of <c>param2</c> is to be interpreted, and, by implication, the use of <c>param1</c>.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType" /> che indica come il riferimento <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> di <c>param2</c> deve essere interpretato e, implicitamente, come deve essere usato <c>param1</c>.

trans-unit.source: An integer value to be passed to the Speech platform when the event requested by the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> to be constructed is generated.
trans-unit.target: Valore Integer da passare alla piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale quando viene generato l'evento richiesto dall'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> da costruire.

trans-unit.source: The exact meaning of this integer is implicitly determined by the value of <c>parameterType</c>.
trans-unit.target: Il significato esatto di questo intero è determinato in modo implicito dal valore di <c>parameterType</c>.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> instance referencing an object.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> che fa riferimento a un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: to be passed to the Speech platform when the event requested by the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> to be constructed is generated.
trans-unit.target: da passare alla piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale quando viene generato l'evento richiesto dall'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> da costruire.

trans-unit.source: The type which must be referenced is explicitly defined by the value <c>parameterType</c>.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo a cui è necessario fare riferimento è definito in modo esplicito dal valore <c>parameterType</c>.

trans-unit.source: The value <see langword="System.IntPtr.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see langword="System.IntPtr.Zero" />.

trans-unit.source: Constucts an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Costruisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> appropriato.

trans-unit.source: Permitted values used for `parameterType`, `param1`, and `param2` and their meaning is dictated by the type of event being requested, as specified by the member of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> used for `eventId`.
trans-unit.target: Consentito di valori utilizzati per `parameterType`, `param1`, e `param2` e il relativo significato dipende dal tipo di evento richiesto, come specificato dal membro della <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> utilizzato per `eventId`.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on appropriate values for `parameterType`, `param1`, and `param2`, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sui valori appropriati per `parameterType`, `param1`, e `param2`, vedere la documentazione per <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of the events which can be handled by the Speech platform infrastructure can be obtained through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the synthesizer engine site implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di eventi che possono essere gestiti dall'infrastruttura di piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale può essere ottenuto tramite il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà sull'implementazione sintetizzatore motore del sito di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente fa parte di un'implementazione di sintesi vocale personalizzato che eredita da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e tramite l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze e crea una nuova matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze deve essere passato il `Speak` metodo su un motore di sintesi sottostante.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore di enumerazione da trovato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, l'implementazione

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms nel testo da leggere.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfacce fornite per il supporto di implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> il tipo di evento, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza viene utilizzata per creare un evento per l'unità viene creato un indicatore di avanzamento sintetizzatore.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Viene quindi chiamato il motore di rendering vocale con modificato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matrice.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> instance is equal to another object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un'istanza <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> è uguale a un altro oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da valutare.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified object is an instance of <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> and equal to the current instance of <c>SpeechEventInfo</c>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un oggetto specificato è un'istanza di <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> ed è uguale all'istanza corrente di <c>SpeechEventInfo</c>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> è uguale all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> corrente; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> da valutare.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> object is equal to the current instance of <c>SpeechEventInfo</c>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un oggetto <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> specificato è uguale all'istanza corrente di <c>SpeechEventInfo</c>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="other" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="other" /> è uguale all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> corrente; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the Speech platform event which an instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is used to request.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene e imposta l'evento della piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale richiesto da un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId" /> as a <see langword="short" />, indicating the event type the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object is to generate.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId" /> come <see langword="short" /> indicante il tipo di evento che verrà generato dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente fa parte di un'implementazione di sintesi vocale personalizzato che eredita da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e tramite l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze e crea una nuova matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze deve essere passato il `Speak` metodo su un motore di sintesi sottostante.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore di enumerazione da trovato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, l'implementazione

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms nel testo da leggere.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfacce fornite per il supporto di implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> il tipo di evento, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza viene utilizzata per creare un evento per l'unità viene creato un indicatore di avanzamento sintetizzatore.

trans-unit.source: The parameters on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, including <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> are used to log the event generated through the `LogSpeechEvent` method.
trans-unit.target: I parametri di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, tra cui <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> vengono utilizzate per registrare l'evento generato mediante la `LogSpeechEvent` metodo.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Viene quindi chiamato il motore di rendering vocale con modificato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matrice.

trans-unit.source: Provides a hash code for a <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> object.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un codice hash per un oggetto a <c>SpeechEventInfo</c>.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object to compare to <c>event2</c>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> da confrontare con <c>event2</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object to compare to <c>event1</c>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> da confrontare con <c>event1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due istanze di <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="event1" /> is the same as <paramref name="event2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="event1" /> è uguale a <paramref name="event2" />; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object to compare to <c>event2</c>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> da confrontare con <c>event2</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object to compare to <c>event1</c>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> da confrontare con <c>event1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due istanze di <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="event1" /> is different from <paramref name="event2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="event1" /> è diverso da <paramref name="event2" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the <see langword="integer" /> value (<paramref name="param1" /> in the constructor) to be passed to the Speech platform to generate an event the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is used to request.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene e imposta il valore <see langword="integer" /> (<paramref name="param1" /> nel costruttore) da passare alla piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale in modo da generare un evento richiesto dall'istanza corrente di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see langword="integer" /> to be passed to Speech platform when the event specified by the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is generated.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il valore <see langword="integer" /> da passare alla piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale quando viene generato l'evento specificato dall'istanza corrente di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The requirements and meaning of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param1%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: I requisiti e il significato di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param1%2A> proprietà di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> vengono determinati in modo univoco dai valori del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> le proprietà di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param1%2A>, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate su come utilizzare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param1%2A>, vedere la documentazione per <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente fa parte di un'implementazione di sintesi vocale personalizzato che eredita da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e tramite l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze e crea una nuova matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze deve essere passato il `Speak` metodo su un motore di sintesi sottostante.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore di enumerazione da trovato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, l'implementazione

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms nel testo da leggere.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfacce fornite per il supporto di implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> il tipo di evento, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza viene utilizzata per creare un evento per l'unità viene creato un indicatore di avanzamento sintetizzatore.

trans-unit.source: The parameters on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, including <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param1%2A> are used to log the event generated through the `LogSpeechEvent` method.
trans-unit.target: I parametri di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, tra cui <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param1%2A> vengono utilizzate per registrare l'evento generato mediante la `LogSpeechEvent` metodo.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Viene quindi chiamato il motore di rendering vocale con modificato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matrice.

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> instance (<paramref name="param2" /> in the constructor) referencing the object to be passed to the Speech platform to generate an event the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is used to request.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene e imposta l'istanza di <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> (<paramref name="param2" /> nel costruttore) cha fa riferimento all'oggetto da passare alla piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale in modo da generare un evento richiesto dall'istanza corrente di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> referencing the object to be passed to Speech platform when the event specified by the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is generated.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'elemento <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> che fa riferimento all'oggetto da passare alla piattaforma di riconoscimento vocale quando viene generato l'evento specificato dall'istanza corrente di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The requirements on the `System.IntPtr` reference of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: I requisiti per il `System.IntPtr` riferimento del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> proprietà di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> vengono determinati in modo univoco dai valori del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate su come utilizzare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>, vedere la documentazione per <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente fa parte di un'implementazione di sintesi vocale personalizzato che eredita da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e tramite l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze e crea una nuova matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze deve essere passato il `Speak` metodo su un motore di sintesi sottostante.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore di enumerazione da trovato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, l'implementazione

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms nel testo da leggere.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfacce fornite per il supporto di implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> il tipo di evento, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza viene utilizzata per creare un evento per l'unità viene creato un indicatore di avanzamento sintetizzatore.

trans-unit.source: The parameters on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, including <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> are used to log the event generated through the `LogSpeechEvent` method.
trans-unit.target: I parametri di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, tra cui <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> vengono utilizzate per registrare l'evento generato mediante la `LogSpeechEvent` metodo.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Viene quindi chiamato il motore di rendering vocale con modificato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matrice.

trans-unit.source: Returns the data type of the object pointed to by the <see langword="IntPtr" /> returned by the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2" /> parameter on the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il tipo di dati dell'oggetto a cui fa riferimento <see langword="IntPtr" /> restituito dal parametro <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2" /> sull'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="short" /> value corresponding to a member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType" /> enumeration and indicating the data type of the object pointed to by the <see langword="IntPtr" /> returned by the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2" /> parameter and used as the second argument for the constructor of the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un valore <see langword="short" /> corrispondente a un membro dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType" /> e che indica il tipo di dati dell'oggetto a cui fa riferimento l'elemento <see langword="IntPtr" /> restituito dal parametro <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2" /> e utilizzato come secondo argomento del costruttore dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The requirements on the `System.IntPtr` reference of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: I requisiti per il `System.IntPtr` riferimento del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> proprietà di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> vengono determinati in modo univoco dai valori del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate su come utilizzare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>, vedere la documentazione per <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.

trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore di enumerazione da trovato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, l'implementazione

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms nel testo da leggere.
